apr.label: Staking APR
apr.tooltip:
The estimated APR range is calculated by applying a
                        dynamic multiplier to your staked position, based on the
                        staking duration.

stakingReward.title: Staking Rewards
stakingReward.tooltip:
The amount of fees charged on each claim that goes
                            to the protocol.

warning.content: You will stop earning swap fee rewards of <1>{{percent}} APR</1>

stakingApr.label: Staking APR
stakingApr.tooltip: The estimated APR range is calculated by applying a dynamic multiplier to your staked position, based on the staking duration.

item.disabled: *You need to unstake your position first.
